name: Quiz Race
description:
QUIZ RACE 
--------------------
# The perfect game for Quiz nights, especially during the COVID-19 Pandemic. 

# Compete against the Quiz Master (Red Car) on a Quiz-off, or shall I say Quiz-Race :P

# The quiz contains over 160 questions!

HOW TO PLAY
---------------------------
# True or False questions will be asked to you.
# Answer the correct answer to make your vehicle move forward (increase speed +1 m/s).
# Incorrect answer will give you a penalty resulting in you losing speed (decease speed - 0.5 m/s).
# Random questions will be asked every game. # To win; reach the finish line before the Quiz Master(Red car) does.
